plot: A telethon for the American Red Cross's relief efforts to benefit victims of Hurricane Sandy features musical performances and footage of the storm's destruction.
title: Hurricane Sandy: Coming Together
plot_es: A telethon for the American Red Cross's relief efforts to benefit victims of Hurricane Sandy features musical performances and footage of the storm's destruction.
plot_en: A telethon for the American Red Cross's relief efforts to benefit victims of Hurricane Sandy features musical performances and footage of the storm's destruction.
